name: Fidget Pong
description:
Fidget Pong is a blend of a modern classic with a current trend. Fun to play with your friends. 7 rounds wins the game.

Designed and Developed by Rise & Shine Games.

Controls:

2 Game Controllers (tested with XBox 360 and PS4, ensure you have drivers installed. We cannot support all controllers.)

Or Red Player is WASD and Blue Player is Up, Down, Left, Right on the Keyboard.
